com.gigya.socialize.android.event

Interface GSPluginListener


  • public interface GSPluginListener
    A listener interface for receiving Gigya plugin events.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onError(GSPluginFragment pluginFragment, GSObject error)
      Invoked after encountering an error, either generated by the plugin or while loading.
      void onEvent(GSPluginFragment pluginFragment, GSObject event)
      Invoked when the plugin fires a custom event.
      void onLoad(GSPluginFragment pluginFragment, GSObject event)
      Invoked after a plugin fragment has finished loading the plugin.

    • Method Detail

      • onLoad

        void onLoad(GSPluginFragment pluginFragment,
          GSObject event)
        Invoked after a plugin fragment has finished loading the plugin.
        Parameters:
        pluginFragment - The plugin fragment that has finished loading.
        event - A GSObject containing details of the event, with fields as described in the relevant plugin's documentation.

      • onError

        void onError(GSPluginFragment pluginFragment,
           GSObject error)
        Invoked after encountering an error, either generated by the plugin or while loading.
        Parameters:
        pluginFragment - The plugin fragment that has encountered the error.
        error - An error object specifying the specific error.

      • onEvent

        void onEvent(GSPluginFragment pluginFragment,
           GSObject event)
        Invoked when the plugin fires a custom event. (For example - commentsUI's commentSubmitted).
        Parameters:
        pluginFragment - The plugin fragment that has fired the event.
        event - The event object.
